description:
Bitroot Leads Bitcoin Innovation: Thailand Summit 2024 Bitcoin Ecosystem Conference Preview

​In November 2024, Bitroot, in collaboration with Moore Labs, will co-host a Bitcoin Ecosystem Conference, showcasing Bitcoin’s foundational role in blockchain innovation.

​The "Bitroot: Bitcoin CeDeFi Eco Meetup" will gather elite Bitcoin projects from around the world to discuss Bitcoin's potential in decentralized finance (DeFi). The conference will serve as a key platform for technical exchanges and will push forward the development of the Bitcoin ecosystem.

​Key Highlights of the Conference:

​ 1. Gathering of Industry Leaders The conference will bring together experts and leaders from various Bitcoin-focused projects to share their latest developments and insights. These projects cover critical areas like Layer 2 scaling, decentralized wallets, and innovative DeFi solutions.

​ 2. In-Depth Technical Insights Attendees will gain valuable technical knowledge through presentations on Bitcoin scalability and the integration of virtual machines.

​ 3. Roundtable Forums The summit will feature roundtable discussions where participants can engage directly with industry leaders to explore opportunities and challenges within the Bitcoin ecosystem, sparking new ideas and collaborations.

​ 4. Cross-Project Collaboration The event will foster cooperation between projects across Bitcoin’s ecosystem, focusing on Layer 2 solutions, decentralized identity, cross-chain technology, and new Bitcoin DeFi applications.

​ 5. Global Perspective With participants from across the globe, the conference will provide insights into market trends and regulatory environments, offering a comprehensive view of Bitcoin’s future.

​Conference Details:

​ • Date: November 13, 2024

​ • IMPACT Challenger Building Popular 1 Rd, Pak Kret District, Nonthaburi 11120 （Room 204）

​ • Participation: Free, Registration only
location: IMPACT Challenger Building Popular 1 Rd, Pak Kret District, Nonthaburi 11120 （Room 204）
